description: Claude Code IDE - Module structure and IPC communication map

isTrustedAppUrl.purpose: Allow only local app URLs to load inside the app window.

openExternalSafely.purpose: Avoid forwarding file/custom scheme URLs to the OS.

initModulesWithWindow.purpose: Initialize modules that need window reference

getMenuTemplate.purpose: Get menu template based on active AI tool

buildAICommandsSubmenu.purpose: Build AI commands submenu based on active tool

openHistoryFile.purpose: Open history file in default editor

ensureWorkspaceDir.purpose: Ensure workspace directory and file exist

restartTerminal.purpose: Restart terminal with new path (creates new terminal in path for current project)

sendCommand.purpose: Send command to active terminal or specific terminal

getTargetDir.purpose: Get the directory path for creating new items relative to a file

createInlineInput.purpose: Create an inline input for rename or new file/folder

showNewItemInput.purpose: Show inline input for creating a new file or folder inside a directory

startRename.purpose: Start inline rename for a file item

showContextMenu.purpose: Show context menu for a file item

focus.purpose: Focus file tree for keyboard navigation

getVisibleItems.purpose: Get all visible file items (for navigation)

handleKeydown.purpose: Handle keyboard navigation in file tree

isHistoryVisible.purpose: Check if history panel is visible

setMultiTerminalUI.purpose: Set MultiTerminalUI reference for terminal session management

setProjectPath.purpose: Set project path and switch terminal session

showPromptDialog.purpose: Show a custom prompt dialog (window.prompt is unreliable in Electron sandbox)

scrollToLine.purpose: Navigate textarea to a specific line and column

setupCollapseToggle.purpose: Setup collapse toggle for projects section

confirmRemoveProject.purpose: Show confirmation dialog and remove project

selectProject.purpose: Terminal session switching is handled by state.js via multiTerminalUI

focus.purpose: Focus project list for keyboard navigation

handleKeydown.purpose: Handle keyboard navigation in project list

init.purpose: Initialize PTY manager with window reference

getDefaultShell.purpose: Get default shell based on platform

getAvailableShells.purpose: Get available shells on the system

getTerminalsByProject.purpose: Get terminals for a specific project

handleMouseDown.purpose: Handle mouse down on resize handle

handleMouseUp.purpose: Handle mouse up to finish resize

getMarketplacePlugins.purpose: Get all available plugins from marketplace

getAllPlugins.purpose: Get all plugins with their status

refreshMarketplace.purpose: Refresh marketplace plugins (git pull or clone)

getPluginIcon.purpose: Get icon for plugin based on name

showToast.purpose: Show toast notification (delegates to shared toast utility)

setupGitWatcher.purpose: Setup .git directory watcher for auto-refresh when panel is visible

showToast.purpose: Show toast notification (delegates to shared toast utility)

renderChanges.purpose: Render source control sections with clear separation (merge, working tree, staged, sync).

handleDiscardFile.purpose: Handle discarding changes for a file

updateCommitArea.purpose: Update commit area visibility and button labels

buildCommitMessage.purpose: Build full commit message from summary + description

handleFetch.purpose: Fetch remote refs and refresh sync indicators.

renderBranchBar.purpose: Branch/upstream info now lives in the activity header.

init.purpose: Initialize the module with window reference

getOAuthToken.purpose: Get OAuth token from macOS Keychain

fetchUsage.purpose: Fetch usage data from Claude OAuth API

startPolling.purpose: Start periodic polling for usage updates

getCachedUsage.purpose: Get cached usage if fresh (< 60s old)

isWorkingTreeClean.purpose: Check if working tree is clean

updateUI.purpose: Update UI to reflect current tool

getStartCommand.purpose: Get the start command for current tool

getCommand.purpose: Get a specific command for current tool

supportsFeature.purpose: Check if current tool supports a feature

loadLocalCommits.purpose: Load recent commits from HEAD (used when no upstream/tracking branch is configured).

loadSyncCommits.purpose: Load outgoing (ahead) and incoming (behind) commits relative to upstream.

loadCommitGraph.purpose: Load ASCII lane graph for recent commits.

loadGitActivity.purpose: Load GitHub-style daily commit activity for the last N days.

gitFetch.purpose: Fetch remote refs for accurate incoming/outgoing calculations.

applyGitHunk.purpose: Apply a single hunk patch to index and/or working tree.

loadGitConflict.purpose: Load base/ours/theirs versions for a conflicted file.

resolveGitConflict.purpose: Save resolved conflict content and stage file.

loadCommitDiff.purpose: Load diff for a specific commit

gitAheadBehind.purpose: Get ahead/behind count relative to upstream tracking branch

getProjectPromptsPath.purpose: Get project prompts file path (stored in .frame/ directory)

getPathForScope.purpose: Get file path for a given scope

showToast.purpose: Show toast notification (delegates to shared toast utility)

init.purpose: Initialize the module with window reference

getSessionsDir.purpose: Get the Codex sessions base directory

normalizeUsage.purpose: Normalize Codex token_count data to the same format as Claude usage

fetchUsage.purpose: Fetch usage data from Codex session files

setupWatcher.purpose: Setup file watcher on the active session file

startPolling.purpose: Start periodic polling for usage updates

escapeHtml.purpose: Escape HTML for safe rendering in text content

escapeAttr.purpose: Escape string for use in HTML attributes (also escapes quotes)

shellQuote.purpose: Uses the '\'' break-out pattern: end quote, escaped quote, start quote.

resolvePathForContainment.purpose: for create/write operations on non-existent targets.

isPathWithinProject.purpose: Resolves symlinks to prevent symlink-based escapes.

isRelativePathWithinProject.purpose: Resolves symlinks to prevent symlink-based escapes.

createPanelHeaderDropdown.purpose: Shared dropdown used in panel headers (Plugins, Source Control, Saved Prompts).

init.purpose: Initialize with callbacks from the orchestrator.

gitCommit.purpose: Create a git commit with the given message

gitCommitAmend.purpose: Amend the last commit, optionally with a new message

undoLastCommit.purpose: Undo last commit (soft reset, keeps changes staged)

revertCommit.purpose: Revert a specific commit (creates a new revert commit)

execFileGit.purpose: Execute git command safely using execFile (prevents argument injection)

execGitWithStdin.purpose: Execute git with stdin payload (used for hunk-level patch operations).

execFileCmd.purpose: Execute a non-git command safely using execFile

parseStatusLine.purpose: X = staged status, Y = unstaged status

isUnmergedStatus.purpose: See git status short format: DD, AU, UD, UA, DU, AA, UU.

parseCommitList.purpose: Parse commit list from a null-delimited git log format.

parseHunkHeaderLine.purpose: Parse hunk header line for labels.

extractHunkPatches.purpose: Extract standalone hunk patches from a unified diff.

stashChanges.purpose: Stash changes (optionally a single file, with optional message)

stashApply.purpose: Apply a stash (keeps it in the stash list)

stashPop.purpose: Pop a stash (apply and remove from stash list)

createContextMenu.purpose: Shared context menu with builder pattern, viewport bounds, and AbortController cleanup

registerFilePathLinks.purpose: Create and register a file path link provider on a terminal instance.

renderBranches.purpose: Render branches list using escaped values for safe DOM manipulation.

renderBranchItem.purpose: Render single branch item (returns escaped HTML string)

renderBranchesError.purpose: Render branches error using safe DOM APIs

populateBaseBranchSelect.purpose: Populate base branch select dropdown using safe DOM APIs

showDiffModal.purpose: Show diff modal for a file

showCommitDiffModal.purpose: Show diff modal for a commit

showStashDiffModal.purpose: Show diff modal for a stash

parseDiff.purpose: Parse unified diff into structured lines

renderDiffContent.purpose: All interpolated values are escaped via escapeHtml/escapeAttr  safe for innerHTML.

renderSplitDiffContent.purpose: Render split diff view. All interpolated values are escaped  safe for innerHTML.

renderWorktrees.purpose: Render worktrees list using safe DOM construction

buildWorktreeElement.purpose: Build a single worktree DOM element using safe APIs

renderWorktreesError.purpose: Render worktrees error using safe DOM APIs

withSpinner.purpose: Adds .spinning class + disabled state during async operations

getToastIcon.purpose: Shared toast component for all panels

buildAugmentedPath.purpose: Build an augmented PATH string that includes common bin directories.

buildExecEnv.purpose: Build a process.env clone with augmented PATH.

resolveCommandPath.purpose: Results are cached for the lifetime of the process.

RESTART_TERMINAL.name: restart-terminal
RESTART_TERMINAL.description: Restart PTY with new working directory

TERMINAL_OUTPUT.name: terminal-output
TERMINAL_OUTPUT.description: PTY output to display in terminal

DELETE_FILE.name: delete-file
DELETE_FILE.description: Request to move file/folder to trash

FILE_DELETED.name: file-deleted
FILE_DELETED.payload: { success: boolean, filePath: string, error?: string }

CHECK_FRAME_PROJECT.name: check-frame-project
CHECK_FRAME_PROJECT.description: Check if directory is a Frame project

circularDependencies.issue: esbuild bundler renames modules when circular dependencies exist (e.g., terminal  terminal2)
circularDependencies.solution: Use window.terminalSendCommand global function instead of direct import
circularDependencies.pattern: Expose functions on window object for cross-module communication that would cause circular deps

ipcVsGlobal.useGlobal: For renderer  renderer communication that would cause circular dependency
